page.title: 04Twinning of Hungerford.
page.content: Hungerford was twinned with Ligueil in 1979 by a man called Mr.Williams.He first contacted Madame and Monsieur Canneton. Ligueil is in the centre of France in the Loire Valley.It is similar to Hungerford because it has schools,a river, a church, an Old Peoples Home and is surrounded by farms. Mr. Williams chose France because he likes it there and he wants the people of Hungerford to become more friendly with the people of Ligueil. Now an annual event is an exchange visit between people of the two towns.In addition to this pupils who study French at the comprehensive school visit Ligueil with there teachers to improve their French, while French boys and girls come to Hungerford to improve their English. This has taken place for 6 years.
